name: DOW
description:
DOW is an another chat room type game

DOW is an acronym for "Discs on wheels"

Controlls:
Arrows - move
C - open chat
X - clear chat
Enter - send message to chat
Escape - return to main menu

Instructions on how to play:
1. Choose your username
2. Enter the name of the room you want to join or create
3. Press connect

If close is set to 1 and you are the room host the room will disconnect once you leave.

Point on players with the mouse cursor to see their username
